titles.title: DEA Order Clearinghouse Act of 2018
A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to require that orders subject to review be submitted through a clearinghouse, and for other purposes.
DEA Order Clearinghouse Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
DEA Order Clearinghouse Act of 2018
This bill requires the Drug Enforcement Administration to establish a national clearinghouse to collect and analyze controlled substance orders in order to identify potentially suspicious orders.
